current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To appropriately limit sequestration, to eliminate tax
		  loopholes, and for other purposes.

action-desc.#text:
Read twice and placed on the calendar pursuant to the order
		  of February 14, 2013

short-title.#text:
American Family Economic
			 Protection Act of 2013

text.#text:
This Act may be cited as
			 the

The table of contents
			 for this Act is as follows:

toc-entry.#text:
Sec. 101. Adjustments to discretionary spending
				limits.

Sec. 202. Supplemental agricultural disaster assistance
				programs.

Sec. 204. Exemption of agriculture, nutrition, and forestry
				from BCA sequestration.
Sec. 302. Fair share tax on high-income taxpayers.

Sec. 303. Denial of deduction for outsourcing
				expenses.
Sec. 304. Modifications to the tax on petroleum.
